meanings.definition: The action of formally joining an organization or institution.
meanings.sent1: Her accessions to the club were celebrated with a small party.
meanings.sent2: The school welcomed the new student's accessions with open arms.
meanings.sent3: The accessions to the team brought a sense of unity and excitement.
meanings.sent4: His accessions to the leadership role were met with admiration and respect.
meanings.sent5: The accessions to the group marked a new chapter of growth and collaboration.

meanings.definition: The process of acquiring new items for a collection, such as a library or museum.
meanings.sent1: The museum's accessions of rare artifacts enriched its collection.
meanings.sent2: The library's accessions of books expanded its resources for readers.
meanings.sent3: The accessions of paintings added color and beauty to the gallery.
meanings.sent4: Her accessions of vintage coins were the highlight of the exhibit.
meanings.sent5: The accessions of historical documents provided valuable insights into the past.

meanings.definition: The act of coming into possession of a title or rank.
meanings.sent1: His accessions to the throne were met with both joy and apprehension.
meanings.sent2: The general's accessions to higher ranks were well-deserved.
meanings.sent3: The accessions of new titles in the kingdom caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: Her accessions to leadership positions inspired many around her.
meanings.sent5: The accessions of noble titles brought prestige and honor to the family.
